definitions.definition: An incident , action , or time period standing out by itself, but more or less connected with a complete series of events.
examples: It was a most embarrassing episode in my life.

definitions.definition: An installment of a drama told in parts, as in a TV series .
examples: I can't wait till next week’s episode .

main_definition: An incident , action , or time period standing out by itself, but more or less connected with a complete series of events.
secondary_definitions: An installment of a drama told in parts, as in a TV series .
